about_the_game:
LUCID invites you to a surreal world, a first-person shooter that defies reality. Experience a fast-paced retro shooter set on a planet reminiscent of ancient Egypt, where you'll confront a civilization ruled by eerie mannequins, embarking on a violent journey for survival.

A Surreal Egyptian Planet:
LUCID transports you to an otherworldly realm reminiscent of ancient Egypt, where the line between dreams and reality is blurred. Explore shifting landscapes, navigate puzzling dimensions, and face off against strange enemies. This mind-bending journey unfolds in a setting that challenges your perception of the past and the present.

Retro Aesthetics, Modern Action:
LUCID features retro-inspired pixelated visuals, paying homage to classic games while incorporating cutting-edge technology. Revel in stunning graphics, dynamic lighting, and fluid gameplay that ensures every shot counts. The game effortlessly blends nostalgic aesthetics with contemporary action.

Unleash Chaos and Violence:
Arm yourself with a powerful array of weapons and abilities to confront the eerie mannequin rulers. Engage in intense, high-speed battles where violence is your ally, and destruction is your goal. LUCID invites you to embrace the adrenaline-fueled chaos of a retro-inspired shooter.

Unravel the Enigma:
The narrative in LUCID is a cryptic puzzle that awaits your exploration. Solve intricate puzzles, decode mysterious messages, and confront bizarre adversaries as you journey deeper into the Egyptian-inspired dreamscape. The boundary between dreams and reality vanishes, leaving you to question your own existence.

content_descriptors.notes: Our game features intense and violence, including combat, explosions, and graphic depictions of combat scenarios. Players will engage in high-stakes battles, and the use of firearms and other weapons is central to the gameplay. While we have worked to create a gripping and action-packed experience, please be aware that this game contains scenes of violence that may not be suitable for all audiences.

  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 980 or better
  • Storage: 5 GB available space

Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 5-1600 / Intel Core i5-7600K
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 1070 6GB or better

short_description: LUCID is a fast-paced, retro-style first-person shooter that thrusts you into a surreal world. Battle against eerie mannequin rulers in a high-adrenaline, violence-packed journey. Explore shifting dimensions in a pixelated dreamscape that blurs the line between reality and imagination.
